TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WebResourceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class WebResourceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class WebResourceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定義中繼資料屬性，以啟用組件中的內嵌資源。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute that enables an embedded resource in an assembly.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別是在組件宣告上使用時才有效。The class is valid only when used on assembly declarations. 它用來啟用指定的內嵌的資源，以作為 Web 資源的組件中。It is used to enable a specified embedded resource in an assembly for use as a Web resource. 如需有關資源的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd)。For more information on resources, see [ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0936b3b2-9e6e-4abe-9c06-364efef9dbbd). ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個程式碼範例示範如何套用命名空間中，定義自訂的控制項，此屬性`MyCustomControl`。The first code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute to a namespace that defines a custom control, `MyCustomControl`. 第二個程式碼範例示範如何使用`MyCustomControl`在網頁中的類別。The second code example demonstrates how to use the `MyCustomControl` class in a Web page. 下列程式碼範例示範如何套用來定義影像 Web 資源和 HTML Web 資源之自訂組件的屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to apply the attribute on a custom assembly to define an image Web resource and an HTML Web resource. `MyCustomControl`類別會定義複合控制項，以設定的值使用的資源屬性複合控制項內，並設定包含控制項屬性控制項的 HTML 資源連結。The `MyCustomControl` class defines a composite control that uses the resources to set the value of the property of an control that is contained within the composite control and to set the property of an control linking to the HTML resource. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.vb#2)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`MyCustomControl`在網頁中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the `MyCustomControl` class in a Web page. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] 這個範例需要您在使用包含的組件編譯的 Image1.jpg 和 Help.htm 資源`MyCustomControl`。This example requires that you compile the Image1.jpg and Help.htm resources with the assembly that contains `MyCustomControl`. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱， [/resource （C# 編譯器選項）](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md)或是[/resource (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/resource.md)。For more information, see, [/resource (C# Compiler Options)](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/compiler-options/resource-compiler-option.md) or [/resource (Visual Basic)](~/docs/visual-basic/reference/command-line-compiler/resource.md). 無法在此範例中使用 HTML Web 資源的範例會顯示下一步。An example of an HTML Web resource that could be used in this example is shown next. 請注意，使用`WebResource`在設定時所使用的語法屬性設`true`Web 資源。Note the use of the `WebResource` syntax, which is used when you set the property to `true` for a Web resource. `` `` `` `Included Help Page` `` `` `
` ` />` `Included help file.` `
` `` ``

span.span: ASP.NET Web Page Resources Overview
Resources in Applications

related.span: /resource （資源檔內嵌至輸出） （C# 編譯器選項）

span.span: /resource (Embed Resource File to Output) (C# Compiler Options)
/resource (Visual Basic)
Packaging and Deploying Resources

summary.span: 取得或設定包含 Web 資源之內容提供網路 (CDN) 的路徑。

span.span: Gets or set the path of a Content Delivery Network (CDN) that contains Web resources.

value.span: 內容提供網路 (CDN) 的路徑。

span.span: The path of a Content Delivery Network (CDN).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool CdnSupportsSecureConnection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值向 表示當使用 HTTPS 存取頁面時，是否應該使用內容提供網路 (CDN) 路徑的安全連接存取指令碼資源。

span.span: Gets or set a value that indicates to the whether a script resource should be accessed using a secure connection to the content delivery network (CDN) path when the page is accessed using HTTPS.

value.span: 如果應該使用 HTTPS 存取 CDN 則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the CDN should be accessed using HTTPS; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，以檢查是否應藉由存取相關聯的指令碼資源CDN 使用安全連接 （使用 SSL）。Use the property to check whether the associated script resource should be accessed by the using a secure connection (using SSL) to a CDN. 使用屬性，當您的 Web 應用程式嘗試從 CDN 支援 SSL 要求安全的內容時，可以避免從瀏覽器警告訊息。By using the property, you can avoid a warning message from the browser when your Web application attempts to request secure content from a CDN that supports SSL.

public: property System::String ^ ContentType { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得字串，包含 類別所參考之資源的 MIME 類型。

span.span: Gets a string containing the MIME type of the resource that is referenced by the class.
The content type of the resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內容類型的範例包括`"image/jpeg"`和`"text/xml"`。Examples of content types are `"image/jpeg"` and `"text/xml"`. 如需有關 MIME 類型的詳細資訊，請移至[Internet Assigned Numbers Authority](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=43988)網站，並參考媒體類型的一節。For more information on MIME types, go to the [Internet Assigned Numbers Authority](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=43988) Web site and refer to the section on media types. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何查詢的值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the value of the property. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 Web 資源已成功載入時所使用的運算式。

span.span: Gets or sets an expression that is used when a Web resource has successfully loaded.

value.span: Web 資源已成功載入時所使用的運算式。

span.span: An expression that is used when a Web resource has successfully loaded.

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")
set: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定布林值，判斷處理 類別所參考的內嵌資源期間，是否剖析其他 Web 資源 URL 並取代成資源的完整路徑。

span.span: Gets or sets a Boolean value that determines whether, during processing of the embedded resource referenced by the class, other Web resource URLs are parsed and replaced with the full path to the resource.

value.span: 如果處理資源期間會解析內嵌資源，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if embedded resources are resolved during processing of the resource; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 資源組件從串流處理至回應，當內嵌的資源中的其他 Web 資源可以解析參考在此階段中，如果屬性設定為`true`。When a resource is streamed from the assembly to the response, references to other Web resources in the embedded resources can be resolved at this time, if the property is set to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何查詢的值屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to query the value of the property. 在此範例中，定義屬性的 HTML 檔案 Help.htm屬性設定為`true`。In this example, the attribute of the HTML file Help.htm is defined with the property set to `true`. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/cs/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebResourceAttribute/vb/WebResourceAttribute.aspx#1)] 無法在此範例中使用 HTML Web 資源的範例會顯示下一步。An example of an HTML Web resource that could be used in this example is shown next. 請注意，`WebResource`當您設定時，使用語法屬性設`true`資源。Note that the `WebResource` syntax is used when you set the property to `true` for the resource. `` `` `` `Included Help Page` `` `` `
` ` />` `Included help file.` `
` `` ``
